name: 王錫九
objective: 1.雙極性電晶體 2.蕭特基接面 3.MOS結構 4.MOSFETS 5.CMOS電路及 製程   6.各種IC技術
schedule:
Week 2-Week 18
1. Introduction.
2. Introduction of IC Fabrication.
3. Semiconductor Basics.
4. Wafer Manufacturing.
5. Thermal Processes.
6. Photolithography.
7. Plasma Basics.
8. Ion Implantation.
9. Etch.
10. CVD and Dielectric Thin Film.
11. Metallization.
12. CMP (Chemical Mechanical Polishing).
13. Process Integration.
14. CMOS Processes.
